library.title: The Midnight Library
library.author: Matt Haig
library.summary: A woman explores parallel lives in a mystical library between life and death.

library.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
library.author: Yuval Noah Harari
library.summary: A thought-provoking journey through the history of humankind.

library.title: Atomic Habits
library.author: James Clear
library.summary: A proven framework for improving habits and achieving long-term goals.

library.title: Dune
library.author: Frank Herbert
library.summary: A classic sci-fi tale of politics, religion, and power on a desert planet.

library.title: The Hobbit
library.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
library.summary: Bilbo Baggins embarks on an unexpected journey through Middle-earth.

library.author: George Orwell
library.summary: A chilling portrayal of a totalitarian regime and constant surveillance.

library.title: The Alchemist
library.author: Paulo Coelho
library.summary: A spiritual journey of a shepherd in search of his personal legend.

library.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
library.author: Harper Lee
library.summary: A young girl’s perspective on race and justice in the American South.

library.title: The Silent Patient
library.author: Alex Michaelides
library.summary: A psychotherapist attempts to unravel the mystery behind a patient’s silence.

library.title: Educated
library.author: Tara Westover
library.summary: A memoir of a woman who escapes a survivalist family to seek education.

library.title: The Lost Pages
library.author: Eleanor Wren
library.summary: A cryptic journal leads a young journalist into a web of secrets hidden in an abandoned city library.
